general_advisory: Light rainfall may occur on Saturday & Sunday with generally cloudy to overcast sky. Keep the harvested paddy in a safe place with polythene to protect from rain. Make arrangements for draining excess rainwater from crops.

advisory: Prepare wet nursery seed beds for paddy
Apply fertilizers like FYM, DAP, MOP, and Zinc sulphate
Sow sprouted seeds with proper spacing
Make alleys for irrigation and drainage
Tie panicles of paddy in bundles after lodging
Spray Neem based pesticide for Fruit and shoot borer control
Follow up with alternate sprays in dry weather
Apply borax during transplanting to prevent Brown rot
